name: watsonx.ai
description: Watsonx foundation models (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

apikey.name: apikey
apikey.info: API uses API keys for authentication.

code.value:
# from axiestudio.field_typing import Data
from axiestudio.custom import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.schema import Record
#from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio import custom
from langchain.schema import Document
from typing import Optional
from langchain.llms.base import BaseLLM
from langchain_ibm import WatsonxLLM


class Watsonx(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "Watsonx"
    description = "Watsonx foundation models"
    
    def build_config(self) -> dict:
        model_options = [
            # Part of the officially supported foundation models in watsonx.ai
            'mistralai/mixtral-8x7b-instruct-v01',
            'meta-llama/llama-3-8b-instruct',
            'meta-llama/llama-3-70b-instruct',
            'meta-llama/llama-2-13b-chat',
            'meta-llama/llama-2-70b-chat',
            'ibm-mistralai/merlinite-7b',
            'codellama/codellama-34b-instruct-hf',
            'google/flan-t5-xl',
            'google/flan-t5-xxl',
            'google/flan-ul2',
            'ibm/granite-13b-chat-v2',
            'ibm/granite-13b-instruct-v2',
            'ibm/granite-20b-code-instruct',
            'ibm/granite-20b-multilingual',
            'ibm/granite-34b-code-instruct',
            'ibm/granite-7b-lab',
            'ibm/granite-8b-code-instruct',
            'bigscience/mt0-xxl',
        ]

        decoding_options = [
            "greedy",
            "sample"
        ]
        
        url_options = [      
            "https://us-south.ml.cloud.ibm.com",
            "https://eu-gb.ml.cloud.ibm.com",
            "https://eu-de.ml.cloud.ibm.com",
            "https://jp-tok.ml.cloud.ibm.com"
        ]

        stp_sequences = [  
            "</s>",
            "<|end_of_text|>"
        ]
 

        return {
            "model_id": {
                "display_name": "Model Name",
                "options": model_options,
                "value": model_options[2],
                "info": "The ID of the model or tune to be used for this request.",
            },
            "url": {
                "display_name": "Url Endpoint",
                "info": "Url endpoint for watsonx",
                "options": url_options,
                "value": url_options[2],
            },
            "apikey": {
                "display_name": "API Key",
                "password": True,
                "info": "API uses API keys for authentication.",
                "value": "HPsQWoh12PnzXwOdPYWZl8q6GusQX9T4vxsvhS-vcdIs",  ###placeholder
                "required": True
            },
            "project_id": {
                "display_name": "Project_id",
                "info": "Project Id necessary to run inference.",
                "value": "f275d991-68a4-47d9-b6e8-c8c052f63b33",  ###placeholder
                "required": True
            },
            # "api_endpoint": { "display_name": "API Endpoint", "value": "https://bam-api.res.ibm.com/v1/" },
            "decoding_method": {
                "display_name": "Decoding Method",
                "options": decoding_options,
                "value": decoding_options[0],
                "info": "Represents the strategy used for picking the tokens during generation of the output text."
            },
            "stop_sequences": {
                "display_name": "Stopping Sequences",
                "options": stp_sequences,
                "value": stp_sequences[0],
                "info": "Encountering these strings will cause the model to stop generation.",
            },
            "min_new_tokens": {
                "display_name": "Minimum New Tokens",
                "value": 5,
                "info": "The minimum number of new tokens to be generated."
            },
            "max_new_tokens": {
                "display_name": "Max New Tokens",
                "value": 4000,
                "info": "The maximum number of new tokens to be generated."
            },
            "temperature": {
                "display_name": "Temperature",
                "value": 0.7,
                "info": "A value used to modify the next-token probabilities in sampling mode."
            },
            "repetition_penalty": {
                "display_name": "Repetition Penalty",
                "value": 1,
                "info": "Defaults to 1"
            },
            "random_seed": {
                "display_name": "Random Seed",
                "value": 1,
                "info": "Defaults to 1."
            },
            "top_p": {
                "display_name": "Top_P",
                "value": 1,
                "info": "Defaults to 1."
            },
            "top_k": {
                "display_name": "Top_K",
                "value": 50,
                "info": "Defaults to 50."
            },
            "code": {"show": False}
        }

    def build(
            self,
            model_id: str,
            apikey: str,
            url: str,
            project_id: str,
            decoding_method: str,
            stop_sequences: str,
            repetition_penalty: float,
            max_new_tokens: int,
            min_new_tokens: int,
            temperature: float,
            random_seed: int,
            top_p: float,
            top_k: int,
        ) -> BaseLLM:
            from ibm_watsonx_ai.metanames import GenTextParamsMetaNames as GenParams
            #creds = APIClient(apikey, url)
            stop_seq = [seq.strip() for seq in stop_sequences.splitlines()]
            params = {
                GenParams.TEMPERATURE: temperature,
                GenParams.MAX_NEW_TOKENS: max_new_tokens,
                GenParams.MIN_NEW_TOKENS: min_new_tokens,
                GenParams.DECODING_METHOD: decoding_method,
                GenParams.REPETITION_PENALTY: repetition_penalty,
                GenParams.TOP_K: top_k,
                GenParams.TOP_P: top_p,
                GenParams.STOP_SEQUENCES: stop_seq,
                GenParams.RANDOM_SEED: random_seed,
            }
            print(params)
            model = WatsonxLLM(model_id=model_id, params=params, apikey=apikey, url=url, project_id=project_id, streaming=True)
            return model

# from axiestudio.field_typing import Data
from axiestudio.custom import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.schema import Record
#from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio import custom
from langchain.schema import Document
from typing import Optional
from langchain.llms.base import BaseLLM
from langchain_ibm import WatsonxLLM


class Watsonx(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "Watsonx"
    description = "Watsonx foundation models"
    
    def build_config(self) -> dict:
        model_options = [
            # Part of the officially supported foundation models in watsonx.ai
            'mistralai/mixtral-8x7b-instruct-v01',
            'meta-llama/llama-3-8b-instruct',
            'meta-llama/llama-3-70b-instruct',
            'meta-llama/llama-2-13b-chat',
            'meta-llama/llama-2-70b-chat',
            'ibm-mistralai/merlinite-7b',
            'codellama/codellama-34b-instruct-hf',
            'google/flan-t5-xl',
            'google/flan-t5-xxl',
            'google/flan-ul2',
            'ibm/granite-13b-chat-v2',
            'ibm/granite-13b-instruct-v2',
            'ibm/granite-20b-code-instruct',
            'ibm/granite-20b-multilingual',
            'ibm/granite-34b-code-instruct',
            'ibm/granite-7b-lab',
            'ibm/granite-8b-code-instruct',
            'bigscience/mt0-xxl',
        ]

        decoding_options = [
            "greedy",
            "sample"
        ]
        
        url_options = [      
            "https://us-south.ml.cloud.ibm.com",
            "https://eu-gb.ml.cloud.ibm.com",
            "https://eu-de.ml.cloud.ibm.com",
            "https://jp-tok.ml.cloud.ibm.com"
        ]

        stp_sequences = [  
            "</s>",
            "<|end_of_text|>"
        ]
 

        return {
            "model_id": {
                "display_name": "Model Name",
                "options": model_options,
                "value": model_options[2],
                "info": "The ID of the model or tune to be used for this request.",
            },
            "url": {
                "display_name": "Url Endpoint",
                "info": "Url endpoint for watsonx",
                "options": url_options,
                "value": url_options[2],
            },
            "apikey": {
                "display_name": "API Key",
                "password": True,
                "info": "API uses API keys for authentication.",
                "value": "HPsQWoh12PnzXwOdPYWZl8q6GusQX9T4vxsvhS-vcdIs",  ###placeholder
                "required": True
            },
            "project_id": {
                "display_name": "Project_id",
                "info": "Project Id necessary to run inference.",
                "value": "f275d991-68a4-47d9-b6e8-c8c052f63b33",  ###placeholder
                "required": True
            },
            # "api_endpoint": { "display_name": "API Endpoint", "value": "https://bam-api.res.ibm.com/v1/" },
            "decoding_method": {
                "display_name": "Decoding Method",
                "options": decoding_options,
                "value": decoding_options[0],
                "info": "Represents the strategy used for picking the tokens during generation of the output text."
            },
            "stop_sequences": {
                "display_name": "Stopping Sequences",
                "options": stp_sequences,
                "value": stp_sequences[0],
                "info": "Encountering these strings will cause the model to stop generation.",
            },
            "min_new_tokens": {
                "display_name": "Minimum New Tokens",
                "value": 5,
                "info": "The minimum number of new tokens to be generated."
            },
            "max_new_tokens": {
                "display_name": "Max New Tokens",
                "value": 4000,
                "info": "The maximum number of new tokens to be generated."
            },
            "temperature": {
                "display_name": "Temperature",
                "value": 0.7,
                "info": "A value used to modify the next-token probabilities in sampling mode."
            },
            "repetition_penalty": {
                "display_name": "Repetition Penalty",
                "value": 1,
                "info": "Defaults to 1"
            },
            "random_seed": {
                "display_name": "Random Seed",
                "value": 1,
                "info": "Defaults to 1."
            },
            "top_p": {
                "display_name": "Top_P",
                "value": 1,
                "info": "Defaults to 1."
            },
            "top_k": {
                "display_name": "Top_K",
                "value": 50,
                "info": "Defaults to 50."
            },
            "code": {"show": False}
        }

    def build(
            self,
            model_id: str,
            apikey: str,
            url: str,
            project_id: str,
            decoding_method: str,
            stop_sequences: str,
            repetition_penalty: float,
            max_new_tokens: int,
            min_new_tokens: int,
            temperature: float,
            random_seed: int,
            top_p: float,
            top_k: int,
        ) -> BaseLLM:
            from ibm_watsonx_ai.metanames import GenTextParamsMetaNames as GenParams
            #creds = APIClient(apikey, url)
            stop_seq = [seq.strip() for seq in stop_sequences.splitlines()]
            params = {
                GenParams.TEMPERATURE: temperature,
                GenParams.MAX_NEW_TOKENS: max_new_tokens,
                GenParams.MIN_NEW_TOKENS: min_new_tokens,
                GenParams.DECODING_METHOD: decoding_method,
                GenParams.REPETITION_PENALTY: repetition_penalty,
                GenParams.TOP_K: top_k,
                GenParams.TOP_P: top_p,
                GenParams.STOP_SEQUENCES: stop_seq,
                GenParams.RANDOM_SEED: random_seed,
            }
            print(params)
            model = WatsonxLLM(model_id=model_id, params=params, apikey=apikey, url=url, project_id=project_id, streaming=True)
            return model
